p: M.v.K., P.P., W.D., F.E., J.P., E.W., M.W., H.K., P.W. are the core GloNAF project members, which searched for and coordinated the collection of inventories of naturalized and invasive alien plants, D.M. and B.L. searched and extracted the environmental and socio-economic variables, and all other authors contributed naturalized plants inventories or other data. T.M. led the analyses, F.E. the writing, with major inputs from all GloNAF core team members and from S.D., T.M, H.S. and B.L., and further inputs from all other authors.
